content: भव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भवत्यस्मात्, भू-अपादाने अप्] (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Arising or produced from, originating in. --वः {@--1@} Being, state of being, existence, (सत्ता). {@--2@} Birth, production; भवो हि लोकाभ्युदयाय तादृशां <ls>R. 3. 14</ls>, <ls>Ś. 7. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Source, origin. {@--4@} Woldly existence; mundane or worldly life, life; as in वार्णव, वसागर &c; <ls>Ku. 2. 51.</ls> {@--5@} The world. {@--6@} Well-being, health, prosperity. {@--7@} Excellence, superiority. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva; दक्षस्य कन्या भवपूर्वपत्नी <ls>Ku. 1. 21</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">3. 72.</ls> {@--9@} A god, deity. {@--10@} Acquisition (प्राप्ति). --वौ (dual) Śiva and Bhavānī.
